snippet: The woman took valuables from the renowned jeweler and then effectively wrote them off the company’s books, the authorities said.
abstract: Ingrid Lederhaas-Okun, former executive at Tiffany & Company, is accused of taking valuables and then effectively writing them off company’s books, allowing items to be canceled from inventory; she is arrested and charged with wire fraud and interstate transportation of stolen property.
lead_paragraph: The woman took valuables from the renowned jeweler and then effectively wrote them off the company’s books, the authorities said.

headline.main: Former Tiffany Executive Is Accused of Stealing Jewelry
headline.print_headline: Former Tiffany Executive Accused of Stealing Jewels
